physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a street that is flanked with shophouses on both sides. Clothes such as tee shirts
 shorts
 and trousers protrude from both levels of these shophouses
 from the sticks in which they are hung from. There are many people sitting on chairs and tables under shelter. Food items are also being sold
 as seen at the left hand side of the photograph. There are cars and rickshaws as well as cyclists on the streets. The background of the photograph features a tall building at the centre.

metadata.title_text: Chinatown Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a street that is flanked with shophouses on both sides. Clothes such as tee shirts, shorts, and trousers protrude from both levels of these shophouses, from the sticks in which they are hung from. There are many people sitting on chairs and tables under shelter. Food items are also being sold, as seen at the left hand side of the photograph. There are cars and rickshaws as well as cyclists on the streets. The background of the photograph features a tall building at the centre.
metadata.subject_terms_1: street scenes residential structures Chinatowns land vehicles
